page.title: 18A Family Holiday
page.content: I woke up on{May Day}morning about 9.15 am.I ate my breakfast and fed the rabbit.My friend came round and we played on the computer.Then we watched Culture Club on TV.We then did wheel spins on our bikes in the street and went down the field where there was tall yellow rape about 1m 50cm tall.I went home and had an ice lolly and a shandy drink and finished half a pint of lager.I showed my Uncle my computer and he played chess.I played with Karl's remote control car.I went home and had salad for tea.Dad and I went to Hockley Golf Range.You get about 60 balls in a bucket for Â£1.00.I had a bath when I got home and watched{The {World's Strongest Man Contest on TV. {The man from Iceland}won.After that I went to bed.I had a lovely{May Day!.}
